data.title: Wonderful area for horeseback riding.
data.text: Beautiful quiet rolling woods and pastures. Perfect for horses. Not really geared for walking trails due to remnants left behind by said horses and hoof prints...  creeks to ford thru as water conditions allow. Centrally located on the south edge of Decatur on Franklin Street Road.

data.title: Bluebells form a carpet in spring
data.text: There are horse trails, but I walk my dog there. Parts are hilly, and parts are meadows. I've seen lots of wildlife and beautiful flowers there. The only disadvantage is you have to ford the creek - no bridges.

data.title: Lots of Trails
data.text:
There are lots of nice trails here, both for hikers and equestrians.  There are also several geocaches here to help keep things interesting. 

We really like all the Macon County Conservation areas.
